ygData.subject: RE: Where to go at my level?
ygData.msgSnippet: In addition to saying you can go to Unrest now, I d agree with Lemac...Unrest is way overcrowded, and the trains are impossible compared to other dungeons.
ygData.messageBody:
In addition to saying you can go to Unrest now, I'd agree with
Lemac...Unrest is way overcrowded, and the trains are impossible compared to
other dungeons. I've never seens trains that bad. When they happen, you had
best MOVE. My shaman actually died there only once, but my other party
members and people I watched died there alot from the trains.

There are lots of places you can go at level 12, especially if your not a
KOS race/class by the good races int he world. Being a HE Bard, you can go
almost anywhere. NRo, SRo, Befallen, WK (about the upper end for WK though),
EK (would be lower end for EK), Paw, SK (lower end for SK), EC and WC. Lots
of places on the main continent would be excellent for you at 12. Beholder
would be ok in a group, take out some muddites or lower end minos. Tons of
places...come explore the main continent!

-Zantaer/Leod, Fennin Ro, SOK

-----Original Message-----
From: Lemac Justerian [mailto:lemac@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:09 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Where to go at my level?


From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>

Do yourself and others a favor... Don't go to Unrest... It is already
overcrowded with people (over 90 last night!) which makes the whole area
slow down...

It's really a good place to get experience, yes... but a TERRIBLE place to
get killed in (especially for a character that cannot bind right outside)
which can happen often to lower levels (those under 15) from the many trains
and long distance from the house to the zone. Many times I have zoned into
Unrest only to find about 10-20 (or more!) bodies in the tunnel from the
zone to the house... It looks awful! And many players have to travel all
the way from Kaladim or Kelethin to get back to their corpse which takes a
long time as well...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: Whitcraft,David <DWHITCRAFT@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 9:04 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Where to go at my level?


> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> You can go to Unrest now. Beetles would be good,possibly solo. Might be
low
> blue to you now though. Get grouped up and start tackling jack-o-lanterns
> and other lawn trash. Don't go in the house tho...bad juju...
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tanthalias [mailto:tanthalas@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 7:54 PM
> To: eqcheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Where to go at my level?
>
>
> I was wondering if anyone could tell me where I should be hunting as a
level
> 12 bard. Ever since level 8 I've been in Steamfront killing skeles and
> clockworks. Now everything con's green (except for mino's, and they're
> usually heavily camped). Where should I be hunting now? Crushbone is way
too
> overpopulated, on Tarew Marr at least. I just need somewhere to hunt until
I
> hit 14 then I'll go to Unrest. Thanks for any help.
>
> Tanthalias
> Half Elven Bard, 12th Level
> Tarew Marr
>
